thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 29 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: U.S. Treasury expects to borrow $441 bln in first quarter

author: Reuters Editorial
title: U.S. Treasury expects to borrow $441 bln in first quarter
text:
WASHINGTON, Jan 29 (Reuters) - The U.S. federal government said on Monday it expects to borrow less in the January-March period than previously announced, the Treasury Department said on Monday.
The department said in a statement it expects to issue $441 billion through credit markets during the period, assuming an end-March cash balance of $210 billion. It also expects to issue $176 billion in net marketable debt in the second quarter. (Reporting by Jason Lange; Editing by Andrea Ricci)
